N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 464.2 - Procedure for initiating volunteer program

State Regulations

Proposals for use of volunteers shall be submitted to the
department for review and approval. Proposals shall include plans for
supervision of the volunteer program; description of specific areas in which
volunteers may serve; methods of recruitment, training, supervision; plans for
payment of volunteers (i.e., reimbursement of out-of-pocket expenses incurred
by the volunteer and for public recognition of services rendered by
volunteers); and the district's plan for gradual expansion of the volunteer
program. Notes
